item.title: MSFConsole Prompt Fiddling
item.author: mubix
item.description: In @carnal0wnage and my presentation at DerbyCon 2011 we talked about using SCREEN and SCRIPT to keep connections live / use them across SSH sessions, and log everything that happens. What we didn’t cover is the fact that there isn’t a time stamp for those logs. Now, Metasploit has multiple ways of creating logs: cat ~/.msf4/logs/framework.log This log automatically logs all of the error data that is great for trouble shooting when something is working, but doesn’t record what you are doing inside of msfconsole msf> spool ~/myclient.
